properties.entry:
select AI.Inquiry_Id, AI.Name, AI.Father_Name, AI.DOB, AI.Contact_No, AI.Application_Status, AI.Due_Date, AI.Created_By, AI.created_on, AI.Updated_By, AI.updated_on, AI.Branch_Id, AI.FollowUp_Required, AI.File_no, AI.Course_Id, AI.Remarks, AI.Email_Id, AI.Lateral, AI.Gender, AI.Consultant_Id, AI.Referred_By, AI.Category_Id, AI.Admission_Mode, null Registration_No
from admissioninquiry AI join taskandfollowup TF on AI.Inquiry_Id = TF.Entity_Id where TF.Task_Date=:Task_Date and TF.Module='ENQUIRY' and TF.Status != 'C';

SELECT Inquiry_Id, Name, Father_Name, DOB, Contact_No, Application_Status, Due_Date, Created_By, created_on, Updated_By, updated_on, Branch_Id, FollowUp_Required, File_no, Course_Id, Remarks, Email_Id, Lateral, Gender, Consultant_Id, Referred_By, Category_Id, Admission_Mode, null Registration_No
FROM AdmissionInquiry where Inquiry_Id=IFNULL(:Inquiry_Id,Inquiry_Id) and IFNULL(Email_Id,'-1') = IFNULL(:Email_Id,IFNULL(Email_Id,'-1')) and Course_Id = IFNULL(:Course_Id,Course_Id) and IFNULL(Contact_No,'-1') =IFNULL(:Phone_No,IFNULL(Contact_No,'-1')) and Branch_Id = IFNULL(:Branch_Id,Branch_Id) and Name like :Name and Application_Status=IFNULL(:status,Application_Status);
